overview.title: Overview
overview.description: ProLog is a digital platform that helps apprentices track their skills, competencies, and milestones toward certification. Its goal is to make apprenticeship journeys clear, structured, and motivating. The platform consolidates fragmented tools into one accessible solution, providing visual progress tracking and encouraging language to keep users engaged throughout their learning journey.

research.title: Research & Insights
research.description: We conducted interviews with apprentices and educators, surveys to understand challenges, and competitive analysis of existing tools. Key findings: Visual progress is preferred over text-heavy instructions. Mobile access is critical for on-the-go tracking. Encouraging, clear language increases engagement and motivation. Apprentices face fragmented information and unclear pathways, making it difficult to track progress, hours, and required competencies.

images.alt: Research findings and user pain points

lofi.title: Lo-Fi Concepts & Early Design
lofi.description: Wireframes focused on dashboard structure, progress visualization, and simple flows. Early feedback highlighted the need for clarity and whitespace. We explored modular cards and minimal screens for digestible content, testing different approaches to displaying competencies and milestones in a way that felt achievable rather than overwhelming.

iterations.title: Iterations & Refinements
iterations.description: Through multiple iteration cycles, we refined the platform based on user feedback. Visual Pathway: Added a clear, step-by-step progress tracker to show journey completion. Reduced Cognitive Load: Broke info into sections, used modular cards for easier scanning. Motivational Language: Refined copy to encourage engagement and celebrate achievements.
improvements: Added visual pathway for clear step-by-step progress tracking
Reduced cognitive load with modular card design
Refined motivational language to encourage engagement
Improved mobile accessibility for on-the-go tracking
Enhanced whitespace and editorial layout for clarity

solution.title: Final Solution
solution.description: Editorial layout with hero, benefits panels, feature modules, team section, and contact CTA. Hover previews and floating media maintain Jackie Hu-style editorial feel. Clean typography, spacing, and negative space highlight content hierarchy. The platform provides apprentices with clear visibility into their progress, required competencies, and next steps toward certification.

outcomes.title: Impact & Reflection
outcomes.description: Apprentices can quickly understand progress and next steps. Modular design allows future expansion to additional trades and certifications. Collaboration strengthened by research and iterative design process. Editorial layout and visual progress tracking increase engagement and motivation. Lessons learned: Visual progress indicators are essential for user motivation. Clear language reduces confusion. Whitespace and editorial design improve content hierarchy and readability.
